description: ## Pre-Study 1. **Ethereum Book - Chapters 1 & 2** [https://github.com/ethereumbook/ethereumbook](https://github.com/ethereumbook/ethereumbook) 2. **Asymmetric Encryption short explainer** [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AQDCe585Lnc](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AQDCe585Lnc) 3. **Fat Protocols by USV** [https://www.usv.com/writing/2016/08/fat-protocols/](https://www.usv.com/writing/2016/08/fat-protocols/) 4. **Ethereum Whitepaper** [https://ethereum.org/en/whitepaper/](https://ethereum.org/en/whitepaper/)
